Rotorua primary school teacher Erin Jarmey sentenced for indecent act with child https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/primary-school-teacher-erin-jarmey-sentenced-for-indecent-act-with-child/ALQKGBDJIZH6HKS6S2SJKVFW54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/primary-school-teacher-erin-jarmey-sentenced-for-indecent-act-with-child/ALQKGBDJIZH6HKS6S2SJKVFW54/ Hannah BartlettA friendship between Erin Jarmey and the child turned into an inappropriate relationship. Photo / Hannah Bartlett
